title: Friends list won't connect, Can't play a game.
body: My friends can play but my stuff won't connect. ;c

replies.body: Your network might be having a few problems getting a solid link with our servers if your friends list won't ever show up and you can't join any games =\ . Most likely you just need to update a few network settings here and there, so make sure to go through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know how that helps!
